attributes.action: extend the proposed payments to victims of the Northern Irleand TROUBLES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
